member.name: D3D11_CONTEXT_TYPE
member.summary: Specifies the context in which a query occurs.

member.name: D3D11_CONTEXT_TYPE.D3D11_CONTEXT_TYPE_ALL
member.summary: The query can occur in all contexts.

member.name: D3D11_CONTEXT_TYPE.D3D11_CONTEXT_TYPE_3D
member.summary: The query occurs in the context of a 3D command queue.

member.name: D3D11_CONTEXT_TYPE.D3D11_CONTEXT_TYPE_COMPUTE
member.summary: The query occurs in the context of a 3D compute queue.

member.name: D3D11_CONTEXT_TYPE.D3D11_CONTEXT_TYPE_COPY
member.summary: The query occurs in the context of a 3D copy queue.

member.name: D3D11_CONTEXT_TYPE.D3D11_CONTEXT_TYPE_VIDEO
member.summary: The query occurs in the context of video.
